item.title: I need help installing Foundation-Industries it dosent seem to work
item.dc:creator: @HappyJamCoding Happy Jam Coding
item.description:
@HappyJamCoding wrote:

1.Download the zip file from Versions Tab
2. Unpack the zip file
3. Take the .pak and .sig files and put them in
Satisfactory/FactoryGame/Content/paks
4. Start the game
